about_the_game:
Disclaimer:

Lu[Idle] does not have a large amount of content and There is a lot of waiting, hence the "idle" part of the name. I put Lu[Idle] on steam as a way to showcase my creation and I apologize if you don't enjoy it. There are planned updates but no plan on when they will be worked on, and If you have any criticism or feedback, you are welcome to share it with me on my discord server.

In Lu[Idle] you play as a game developer making a Lua game but instead of coding you are clicking. Make your game huge by clicking and getting Bytes which is the amount of storage your game takes up and as we all know more Gigabytes = better game. Type commands into the console to make code that brings your games storage up automatically, upgrade your mouse to gain more bytes per click and drink some coffee for a boost and purchase a server to make your game even bigger. Get immersed and become a Lua game developer today in Lu[Idle]. This game is very early access and is lacking a lot of features that I intend to add and the price will most likely increase as updates come.

Key Features

  • Upgradable Code Snippets to Increase your Bytes per Second

  • Console to Input various Commands found in the Commands Folder Tab

  • Upgrades Tab to Increase your Games Size even more

  • Release your game and gain sales to make your future games better (prestige)
detailed_description:
Disclaimer:

Lu[Idle] does not have a large amount of content and There is a lot of waiting, hence the "idle" part of the name. I put Lu[Idle] on steam as a way to showcase my creation and I apologize if you don't enjoy it. There are planned updates but no plan on when they will be worked on, and If you have any criticism or feedback, you are welcome to share it with me on my discord server.

In Lu[Idle] you play as a game developer making a Lua game but instead of coding you are clicking. Make your game huge by clicking and getting Bytes which is the amount of storage your game takes up and as we all know more Gigabytes = better game. Type commands into the console to make code that brings your games storage up automatically, upgrade your mouse to gain more bytes per click and drink some coffee for a boost and purchase a server to make your game even bigger. Get immersed and become a Lua game developer today in Lu[Idle]. This game is very early access and is lacking a lot of features that I intend to add and the price will most likely increase as updates come.

Key Features

  • Upgradable Code Snippets to Increase your Bytes per Second

  • Console to Input various Commands found in the Commands Folder Tab

  • Upgrades Tab to Increase your Games Size even more

  • Release your game and gain sales to make your future games better (prestige)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most Recent
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It probably works but if it doesn't just refund and let me know.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent Version
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It probably runs on any Mac Idrk just try it and if it doesnt work just refund and let me know

name: Lu[Idle]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WinXP+ (32, 64 bit)
  • Processor: Almost every processor will work
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Probably anything works even integrated
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Lu[Idle] is an Incremental game with Idle and Clicker elements as well as pixel art visuals and music.
